-- | A markdown to Frame GUI writer for Pandoc
--   
--   A markdown to Frame GUI writer for Pandoc
@package frame-markdown
@version 0.1

module Frame.View.Markdown
markdownToViewPart :: String -> Data
pandocToViewPart :: Pandoc -> Data
toContainers :: [Block] -> [Container]
blockToContainer :: Block -> Container
inlinesToElement :: [Inline] -> [Element]
inlineToElement :: Inline -> Element
inlineToString :: Inline -> String
